inn1.comm: length delivery on the middle stump  line, moving in from the leg stump, tucked between midwicket and square-leg for a single
length delivery well outside off, Karthik goes after it, tries a cut shot but can't connect

Edged past the lone slip It was a short of length delivery that straightened outside off stump and DK punches it.. It flies of the edge and goes well wide of the slip fielder. Perhaps around third slip region
beaten outside off Another one that straightens outside off and DK pushes inside the line
gets behind the line of this one to tap it to the off side of the pitch
leans forward to defend towards covers
fullish, outside off stump, Gambhir mistimes his drive to covers. The bat-face shuts as he reaches out away from his body
short in length, straightens on the off stump line, Gambhir taps it back down the track
Gorgeous! It was full on the off stump line and Gambhir leans forward to present the full face of the bat. And he just caressed it past the non striker.
outside off stump, pushed to point
around the off stump line, on a length, turned to point
slower one, slips on to the middle and leg line, Gambhir waits before tucking it behind square-leg
threatens to jump out before he stops and pushes it towards mid-off for a quick single
walks down the track and Kula gets the ball to nip back in from short of length; it moves past the prod and strikes the thigh pad
full in length around off, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single. Angelo with the throw and Karthik dived to get back inside the crease
lovely delivery cutting away from Gambhir - a classic Kula delivery- and Gambhir is beaten on the defensive prod.

Dropped by Kandamby who replaced Samaraweera in the team. It was the length delivery outside off .. Gambhir charged out, moved outside leg and went for the slog over the off-side. And edged it. Kandamby leaped at first slip but the ball brushed his hands - he went with both hands - and eluded him.

Sanga drops it now! Oh dear .. what is ha penning out there. It was a length delivery again cutting away from Gambhir who pushes at it,  bat away from the body, and edges it. Sanga, who was standing up to the stumps, clangs it! Gambhir is riding his luck here. Poor Kula. Twice he produced the edge but ..
good delivery, extra bounce from back of length, and Karthik stabs it to the off side
around the off stump, from short of length, pushed out to point
pushes this thro wide mid-on region and by the time Maharoof jogs after it in his inimitable style, they take two
length delivery shaping away on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
He went down the track - he walked out - and fetched the back of length delivery from around off stump and whipped it to right of Maharoof at mid-on
takes a couple of steps down the track and Malinga aims for his boot, turned past square-leg
leans forward to drive and drags it of the inner half of the bat to the on side. Sanga is standing up to the stumps
cuts back in from outside off, punched to covers
lands on a length outside off stump, and tilts in but not as much as DK thought it would. He pushed inside the line and was beaten. Sanga collects
leans forward to punch the length delivery to mid-off
Edged to third man It was a back-of-length delivery that straightened well outside off, DK went after it and ended up slashing it of the outer edge.
around the off stump, punched to mid-off
slower, full in length around off, Gambhir is a touch early into the drive and pushes it out to mid-off
short in length, kicks up on the middle, tucked past square-leg
walks down the track and dabs the short-of-length delivery to right of mid-on
on the pads, rolls away behind square-leg
Shot! It was a short of length delivery not far away from the off stump, Karthik went back and across and hit it on its head. He chopped it away through backward point
gets forward to punch it to mid-on

Gambhir is run out His luck runs out. Finally. It was clipped past square-leg and Tharanga fires it towards the bowler. Gambhir was very late to start for third run  but he tried to complete the run. The throw came to Kula who very calmly broke the stumps. Gone! Gambhir was pretty slow there. Even in the second run, he stopped at the start and jogged across. As if he had settled in his mind for two runs. He then sees DK has turned for the third run and he tries to hustle across. Too late
in the zone outside off stump, beaten on the drive
length delivery around off, leans forward to defend
leans forward to defend to the on side
gets behind the line to defend
reaches forward to punch the length delivery and edges it to third man
Top shot. He walks down the track and leans across to punch a back-of-length delivery on the up and to the left of mid-off. Lovely timing.
punches this one to mid-off
Another short-of-length outside off stump, Karthik punches it on the up through cover point. Another nicely timed shot.
Lovely hit. Merely punched. It was the slower one outside off stump and DK waits and punches it sweetly to left of mid-off. Pure timing.
short in length, punched away to covers
leans forward to defend to the off side
gets off the mark with a clip past square-leg
short in length outside off, cut down to Maharoof at third man
in the channel outside off and Virat is beaten, pushing inside the line
gets behind the line to defend to the off side
leans forward to deflect it to the on side
cuts in towards off stump, worked to short midwicket
leans forward to defend to the off side
in the zone outside off, left alone
around the off stump line, punched to point
just outside off stump, cut to backward point
5th dot ball in a row. It was punched back to Angelo.
short of length, punched straight down the pitch and Angelo lunges out to make a half-stop
on the middle and off line, full in length, Virat prefers to get back to defend
short in length this time, around off, punched out to covers
guides this back of length delivery tilting in to backwards point
gets behind the line to defend to the off side of the pitch
leans forward to push to covers . fumble there and they take the run. First run in the last 15 balls
on the middle stump line, clipped past square-leg
slower one, well outside off, Dk reaches out, checks his shot and taps it to backward point
just outside off stump, run down to third man
around the off, pushed out to covers
straightens around off stump, leans forward to defend
leans forward to drive it past the diving bowler who takes some pace of it and the ball rolls to mid-on
around the off stump line, pushed to short extra cover
short in length, pulled past square-leg
in the zone outside off, left alone
banged in short around off, mistimes the pull to square-leg
gets forward to push it to mid-on
slower one and shout for lbw. Karthik had walked down the track and got an inside edge on to his pad
short in length, stops on DK who ends up mistiming the pull shot to square-leg
reaches out to a delivery well outside off and drives wide of sweeper cover. Kandamby gets across and should have thrown in a dive but just gave up. Hmmm..
around the off stump line, worked to right of mid-on
runs it down to third man

The second boundary of the over. Another misfield. THis time by Kula. Virat had stretched across to outside off and clipped the short-of-length delivery through midwicket. Kula was running back, bent down in front of him and picked the ball but couldn't release it .in time before he went over the boundary.
drives to deep point for a single

Fab piece of timing. DK just leaned forward and seemed to present the full face of the bat to the ball. Single to left of mid-off? Nope.. the timing is perfect and the ball races away. India have broken free in this over.
short of length outside off, clipped wide of midwicket
on the off and middle, full in length, turned to short midwicket
gets forward to push it to covers
Neat. It was perhaps a touch back of length and just outside off, Kohli stayed back to punch it sweetly on the up and through covers
pushes this to cover point for a single
dropped by Maharoof Very difficult chance. It was punched on the up well to the right of Maharoof who dived low but couldn't hold on to it. It was a slower one.
leans forward to turn it to left of the fielder at square-leg. They think about a single but decide against it.
leans forward to drive down to long-on
gets back to defend to the off side
flighted full outside leg and Karthik brings up his fifty with a well-placed sweep shot. He raises his bat to the dressing room and Kohli gets across to pat him on the back
leans forward to defend
goes well back to defend bu the ball goes past the bat and Sanga fails to collect cleanly as well
fullish outside off, driven to right of mid-off
in the zone outside off, ;left alone
slips to the middle and leg line and Virat clips it past square-leg. No risk. No flamboyance. Wristy shot.
works this gently past square-leg for another single
banged in short.. goes high and outside off, left alone
Another high bouncer but this one hasn't been called a wide. Hmmm
the slow yorker, on the middle, pushed out to the off
turns in to the middle and leg line, worked behind square-leg
full and outside off, swept away for a single
straightens outside off, punched back to Murali
leans forward to tap the doosra to cover point
turns in from outside off, DK goes for the reverse sweep and is hit on the body
goes for the conventional sweep shot and this one rolls away of the pad
gets forward to whip it past square-leg for a single. 100 for 1.
Malinga takes out Virat. It kicked up outside off from short of length and Virat stabbed at it, bat away from the body. Edge and gone!
full and wide down the leg side
full delivery, dips on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket
bouncer around the off stump and DK sways away
another lifting delivery but this time down the leg side
Sharp bouncer on the middle and leg line and DK ducks. Malinga smiles
yet another short delivery, this time outside off, left alone
short in length around off stump line, defended to the off side
spins down leg and brushes the pad ..
stays back to punch the off break to right of long-on
goes well back to work it past square-leg
leans well forward to clip it to the on side
goes down the track to drive and Murali lunges to his right to stop
stretches forward to drive to long-off
in the zone outside off, left alone
jumps from short of length and outside off, not dissimilar to the delivery that removed Virat but Dhoni manages to pull his bat away from the line of the delivery
on the off and middle, pushed out to mid-on
lifter around off, Dhoni was caught on the shuffle, cramped for room and he hops to jab it down to the off side
good bouncer on the middle and Karthik was looking to ride the bounce but decides to get down eventually
gets forward to defend to covers
goes back to work it behind square-leg
straightens outside off, chopped away to backward point
leans well forward to work it to midwicket
turns in to the off and middle, punched to sweeper cover
slower , spins in to the middle, tapped to the square-leg region
moves down the track and clipped to backward square-leg
around the off stump line ,steered wide of backward point
stays back to defend this one
Bosh! Full in length outside off stump and Dhoni lashes it through the line .. up and over the straight boundary. Whack!
jumps down the track to push it to right of Maharoof who fails to stop it. It could have got interesting had he picked up. How far had DHoni come down the track? Was there a chance of a run out?
gets down the track and punches it on the up to short extra cover
works this behind square-leg and they will complete the second run
was slightly beaten in the flight but goes through with the shot. He rushed down the track but the ball dipped on him and he ended up dragging it wide of long-on
leans well forward to defend
moves down the track and defends ala Ravi shaz
doosra just outside off, cut away but Maharoof dives to his right at backward point
runs down the track but again the ball dips on him, he lunges out to take it on his pad
leans well forward to push it towards midwicket for a quick single
shortish delivery outside off, flat-batted to long-on
flighted full, tapped to midwicket for a easy single
drops it short and Dhoni pulls it wide of deep midwicket
pushes this one back to the bowler
long hop outside off, could have been hit anywhere, Dhoni flat bats it to long-on
shortish again, pulled away to right of long-on
lovely flighted off break lures Dhoni down the track but dips rapidly on him and turns past the one-handed waft and runs of the pad
stretches forward to jab it to the on side
stretches his pad well outside off to take it on the pad
flighted delivery on the middle, reverse paddled to short third man region .. It was the doosra and he paddles it of the back of the bat
goes right back to clip it through midwicket
from round the stumps this time , off break on the middle, worked to midwicket
goes back to pull it through midwicket
leans forward to work it to square-leg
gets forward to drive to long-off
stretches well forward to work it through the on side
outside off, cut to sweeper cover
goes back to defend and it runs of the pad to leg gully
skips down the track and drive s to long-on
doosra from round the stumps, defended on the front foot
turns in to the middle, tapped past square-leg
gets well forward to push to covers
goes right back to swat it to the fielder placed forward of square-leg

Gentle full toss. Big swing of the bat. Out! Oh he has messed up there! It was a lollypop thrown around the leg stump line and Karthik went for the slog sweep and top edged it to deep square-leg. Good innings but it's over now.
outside off stump, steered to backward point
pushes this to the off side
goes back to cut to sweeper cover
flighted full around off, eased to long-off
on the middle and leg, turned to short midwicket
goes right back to work it to square-leg fielder
from round the stumps, on the off, tapped to the on side. Mahela is at first slip
leans across to ping long-off
Another misfield Dhoni leaned back to punch the off break straight to short extra cover and straight to Maharoof. Oh dear .. what a mess! The ball went right through him and to the boundary.
leans forward to defend the off break
works this out to the on side
goes right back to punch to long-off
moves down the track and drives the flighted leg break to long-off
gets forward to drive to right of short extra cover where Dilshan dives to make a half stop
well outside off and Dhoni reaches across to drive to sweeper cover
lands outside off and Rohit has a waft at it and is beaten. He drove well away from the body and missed
shorter, outside off, dragged down to long-on
Right .. here is Dilshan ... shorter in length, on the leg and middle, clipped to deep midwicket
goes down the leg side for a wide
on the middle, punched to left of straightish midwicket where Kapu makes a diving stop
reaches forward to on drive to long-on
around the off stump, off driven to long-off for a single
on the middle, Dhoni goes back to force it to long-on
Catch it was the cry but it was chipped over short extra cover fielder. It was a flighted delivery, full around the off stump, Rohit leaned forward to lift it inside-out over the leaping fielder
reaches forward to drive it back to the bowler

Kandamby is on a roll. Not a great ball again but he gets another wicket! It was short, it was wide and Dhoni reaches out to cut it towards backward point where Kulasekara dives forward to take a good catch.
leans forward to drive the full toss to long-off
lands well outside off stump, left alone
leans forward to drive through the on side
skids on towards middle, tucked behind square-leg
floated across from round the stumps, defended back to the bowler
leans forward to push to short covers
just outside off, steered wide of covers for a single
floated outside off, did it drift away?, Rohit reaches out and has to really lunge out in the end to jab it to the midwicket region
works this to the on side
outside off, guided to backward point. No chance for a single there and Rohit gets back
flighted full outside off, driven to deep cover
leans forward to on drive to long-on
leans well forward to defend
full and on the middle, tapped to square-leg
reaches forward to square drive to point
gets well forward to drive to deep cover
gets forward to drive to long-off
gets forward to ping long-off
flighted outside off, square driven to left of sweeper cover but Angelo initially moved the wrong way. Sanga shouted out and Angelo changed directions!
leans forward to defend to the off
flighted full, on driven to long-on
on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
leans well forward to defend to the off side

Another fumble from Maharoof Oh dear .. Sanga glares angrily. .. It was chipped to  right of long on and Maharoof over ran .. or did it spin back .. not sure what happened there and he reached out his left hand but couldn't stop. Sanga isn't too happy but doesn't say anything.
worked away for a single
short and wide, not dissimilar to the ball that took out Dhoni, Raina crashes it to the cover boundary
taps this one to the on side of the pitch
leans forward to drive to long-off
floated full around off, eased to long-off
gets forward to defend to the off side
stays back to punch it to short extra cover
on the middle and leg, turned around the corner
spins in from a length, Rohit lunges out to jab it back down the pitch.
leans forward to drive to covers
punches this through point
run down to third man for a single
the short delivery but slips it down the leg side
sharp lifter on the middle and leg line, Raina hops and presents the bat as a face shield in a quite ungainly manner but manages to jab it to square-leg
the short delivery on the leg stump line and Rohit pulls it down to fine-leg region. There is a spot there where if the ball hits the batsman could get 1500 dollars but Rohit misses it by a whisker.
a better directed bouncer this time and Rohit gets away from the line of fire
stays back to punch it to right of Kandamby at long-on
on the legs, turned to fine-leg and Maharoof slowly gets across to cut it
reaches forward to defend to the off side
Blasted that! He reached outside off, went down on his knee and slog swept to wide midwicket region.
gets forward to defend back down the track
Now another four, this time through covers. He reached across to smash this one to the boundary.
on the middle and leg, tapped past square-leg
There comes a bouncer and Raina hops and then sways. The ball was just outside leg I guess
Another short delivery, Raina hops back to glide it to fine-leg where Kula makes a diving stop. No jokes please on what would happened had Maharoof was stationed there.
ooh .. sharp nasty lifter and Riana shapes to push at it, then takes his eyes of the ball and just about manages to sway away from
jumps to get on top of the bounce to defend
short in length around off and Raina jumps, realises it doesn't bounce and comes down to defend

Lasith Malinga take a bow. What a ball! He was firing bounces so far. And then slips in the yorker. The oldest two-card trick. Raina was on the hop and he couldn't get his bat in line of the delivery. Dead duck.
turns in from outside off, extra bounce,, stabs it of the edge to the off
leans forward to wrist it to short midwicket
That man Maharoof again What's wrong with the poor fella today.. It was pushed to right of backward point where he tumbled but let the ball slip through his grasp
leans well forward to defend
in the zone outside off, left alone

Shout for lbw Close shout. It landed on the middle and leg stump line and straightened. Jadeja got into an awful position and lost his balance and almost tipped over as he looked to jab it away. It would have hit the leg stump. Bowden says no. Hope they show the replays on that
full in length, on the middle, turned to short midwicket
on the off and middle, slower, pushed out to the on side
on the off stump line, pushed to cover point
leans forward to defend to the off
stays back to punch this to sweeper cover
around the off stump line, defended on the front foot
leans forward to squeeze it to backward point
goes right back to push it back to the bowler
turns from outside off stump, Rohit is beaten on the shot. how did that miss the off stump? He was cramped for room
goes back to punch it down to long-on

shout for lbw but struck just outside off. It was delivered from round the stumps and went on straight with the angle.. Jadeja had no clue and just stabbed in thin air. The ball ran to third man where Mahela Jayawardene makes a diving stop .. and seems to have hurt himself in the process
goes back to push to covers
slower one outside off stump, chipped over covers for couple of runs,. Ala Carl hooper there
another slower one, this from short of length, Rohit picks it late but adjusts to tap it close on the off side for a single.
short in length and outside off, steered towards deep backward point
goes for the yorker, dips around leg stump line, jabbed to square-leg
low full toss outside off and Jadeja slices it wide of third man where Kandamby is too slow to get across in time to cut it off
fullish, on the off stump line, pushed out through covers
moves down the track and drags the full toss to mid-on
fullish on the middle, dug out to covers
full toss and wide outside off, Jadeja can't reach
full pitched on off and middle, pushed back to the bowler

run out of Rohit missed fullish outside off, Jadeja edges the off drive to right of Sanga who flicks the throw but misses the stumps. Rohit was way out of the crease. Sanga had the time to take the right glove off but he didn't.
driven to the on side of the pitch and Kulasekara makes a fine diving stop
full delivery, pushed away for a single that would help him retain the strike
low full toss just outside leg, Rohit shapes to swing it over midwicket but misses and will pick up a leg bye
bouncer on the middle stump line, Jadeja tries to upper cut but can't connect
wide down the leg side this time
slower one well outside off, Jadeja reaches out to bottom edge it to left of Sanga
Rohit clears his front leg and Malinga fires a yorker and it goes between Rohit's legs and Sanga makes a diving save

almost caught by Randiv, the substitute. It was the slower one outside off and Jadeja was early into his slog. The ball lobbed over covers and Randiv rushed back and flung himself full stretch for an amazing effort. Ala Roshan Mahanama
runs this one down to third man
really full delivery, pushed out to the off for a single
Maharoof takes a catch. Seriously. No really. It was the slower one and Rohit top edged the paddle sweep and it lobbed to Maharoof at short fine-leg. Rohit out after making 41
full delivery around off, jabbed out to mid-off
almost yorker length, dug out to midwicket
Jadeja goes for the big drive but can't connect cleanly. Beaten by the full length. And he drags it wide of long-on

Jadeja's run out missed Low full toss outside off and sliced straight to backward point. Jadeja is turned back by his partner and he gives up the ghost. But the throw is wide of the mark. I didn't catch the sight of the fielder. Hopefully, replays will be shown. They then take the single for the overthrow
gets forward to tap this one for a single
really full delivery, not quite an yorker and it thuds into the pad
Jadeja moves outside leg and Malinga follows with a fiery bouncer and Jadeja just about manages to sway away
moves down the track and then tries to slice a full-length delivery outside off but no wood on leather
super yorker and Jadeja can only dig it out.
slings across a low full toss, Harbhajan drags it of the inner edge to his pad
full and outside off, Harbhajan was trying to get outside leg and he then tries to  reach across for the off drive but doesn't connect
full length delivery, dragged wide of long-on
slower one, Harbhajan is too early into his slog but manages to edge it to vacant space on the leg side .. by the time the deep midwicket fielder moved in, they take two
really full delivery, it landed between Harbhajan's legs and he adjusts to tap it through midwicket!
pushes this well outside off stump
driven to right of long-on for couple of runs. The throw comes in accurately at the non-striker's end and Kula breaks the stumps but the batsman was in
low full toss outside off, sliced away to deep cover

inn2.comm: in the zone outside off stump and Tharanga pushes inside the line and the ball goes past the outside edge
curves in, tucked behind square-leg for couple of runs
again there is a bit of movement out there. It shaped in and Tharanga leaned forward to work it through midwicket
around the off stump line, pushed out to the off side
Dilshan combusts! What a soft hit. It was the short delivery well outside off and Dilshan tried to fetch it with a pull. Limp shot. The ball lobbed gently to mid-on. Huge wicket this. Indians roar.
on the leg stump line, curves in to roll of the pad
in the zone outside off stump, shapes away, left alone
in the channel outside off stump, left alone

How did that miss the edge? How did that miss the off stump? It shaped in the air, landed on a length around off and straightened. Tharanga pushed inside the line and the ball almost kissed the off stump.
gets forward and behind the line of the length delivery to defend
Swing and a miss. Hmm .. It was in the channel outside off and Tharanga went for the expansive on-the-up off drive
similar delivery, left alone this time
pushes this one down the leg side for a wide
slants this across Sanga who allows it to go through to Dhoni
Edged short of the first slip. It was a length delivery curving away from Sanga who just about managed to hold his bat in line. and check his shot and edged it short of the fielder
outside off, moving away, run down to third man
in the zone outside off, left alone
in the channel outside off stump, Tharanga went for an injudicious pull shot and Dhoni took that
moves in with the angle. Sanga hops to defend and the ball moves past the prod to hit the thigh pad
full in length around off stump, squeezed to third man
around the off stump, punched to Kohli at point
on the middle, coming in from outside off, defended back to Zaheer
moves outside leg even as he charges out and tries to slash it over cover point but ends up edging it to third man. Pressure!
length delivery on the stumps, Sanga stumbles out to defend and is hit high on the pad.
full and outside off, another swing and a miss from Tharanga, who has looked really scratchy tonight
And Just as I type that, he plays a fab shot. It was a short-of-length delivery outside off and Tharanga went back and across to knife it through cover point.
on the leg stump line, rolls of the pad
short in length and well outside off, mistimes the cut to covers. Tharanga was not in a great position to play that.
chops this to left of third man where Nehra makes a tumbling save.
stands tall to punch a back-of-length delivery though extra cover. Fine shot.
leans forward to mistime the drive out to the off side
full in length and outside off, Sanga shapes for the square drive but makes contact with the toe end of the bat
full in length outside off, driven to mid-off .. Gambhir moves to his right to stop it
cuts in with bounce and strikes the thigh pad. Movement and bounce
full delivery around off, defended on the front foot
leans forward to push to covers
full and well outside off, Sanga leans across on a bent knee to smash it through covers.
taps this gently towards mid-off for a single
short in length, moves in from outside off, punched away to mid-off
from round the stumps again, homing in on the off and middle line, tapped to the off side
in the zone outside off, pushed out to covers
short in length from round the stumps, Tharanga tries to slog pull it and top edges it over the bowler. It drops safely between mid-off and mid-on!
Carved over point! It was a short delivery outside off and Sanga punches it over point. Slap!
Ripper! This one cuts back in sharply from outside off. huge movement. It cuts Sanga into half and goes over the stumps!
pushes this one down the leg side
on the middle and off line, eased to mid-on
another one that cuts back in sharply and moves past the prod and hits the thigh pad.

Oh boy! what has he done! He shoulders arms to a delivery that cuts back in from outside off to take out the off stump! As they say in gully cricket, a very bad "well left" Not! He has been at the other end and has been watching Zaheer cut the ball in a great deal while bowling to Sanga but he decides to shoulder arms. This one pitched just outside off and tilted in. Clatter!
around the off stump line, tapped to the on side
gets forward to push it to mid-off
pushes this for a single
lands around off and curves away, left alone
around the off stump line, pushed to covers
short in length and moves away , Mahela reaches out to play a nice cut shot
full in length and just outside off, pushed towards mid-on
pushes this one down the leg side
slants this one well outside off and Mahela chases it and is beaten on the drive
Lovely hit! It was full and on the leg stump line, Mahela leaned forward to stylishly pick it over wide midwicket ..
This time he leans across to lift a length delivery over covers.
in the corridor outside off, left alone
big swing and a miss! It was a length delivery outside off, Mahela goes for the big lofted drive over the bowler's head
around the off stump line, pushed out to point
on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket region
curves away from the off stump line, defended on the front foot
around the off stump line, defended to covers
around the off stump line, pushed to the on side
around the off stump line, pushed out to covers
full in length and outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Shout for lbw! It landed around the leg stump line, perhaps just outside leg and hits Mahela in front of the leg
gets forward to tap this one away for a single
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
around the off stump line, tapped to backward point
short in length, mistimes the cut to point
cuts this one to front of point where Virat makes a diving stop
full in length and outside off, left alone
oooh beaten Lovely seam position .. it landed on a length around middle and off and seamed away past the edge. Sanga was looking to defend
pushes this one well outside off
lands on a length around off stump line, left alone
on the middle and leg, turned to Gambhir at square-leg
Another peachy delivery! It landed on a length around off and middle and seamed away. Sanga stumbled out to defend and was beaten
full and down the leg side. Dhoni appeals for a leg-side catch. Umpire extends his arms. Nehra didn't appeal.
just outside off, on a length, pushed back to the bowler
leans forward to punch it to mid-off

It kicks up outside off stump from back of length  and Mahela stabs at it, away from the body, and gets the edge. Virat Kohli had fallen in a similar fashion earlier today. Sri Lanka three down and wobbling
short in length around the off stump and it curves in with bounce, Angelo pushes outside the line and the ball flies past the off stump
Another one down. Injudicious shot from Angelo. It was a back-of-length delivery well outside off and Angelo chased it well away from the body. Edge and gone!
around the off stump line, defended to covers
lands around off and seams away, left alone
walks down the track and PK bangs it in shorter, defended to the on side
around the off stump line, tapped to the on side of the pitch
in the zone outside off stump line, left alone
in the channel outside off, shaping away, the batsman is beaten, pushing inside the line
another one curving away, squeezed to gully
around the off stump line, defended to the off side

Ashish Nehra is da maan for India tonight. Nehra banged it in short just outside off and Sanga went for the pull shot. Mistake. Fatal Mistake. He hits it limply to mid-on were Zaheer takes the dolly. The Sri Lankan captain departs. The ball has been jagging around under the lights and the top order has been found wanting.
lovely full delivery on the off and middle, shaping in ever so late and the batsman edges it to his pad
cuts in sharply, moves past the prod and strikes the pad high
full in length around off, pushed to Harbhajan at mid-off
on the middle stump line, Kandamby is very late in getting the bat around the frnt pad but eventually does so and pushes the ball towards mid-on
short in length, tucked to square-leg
around the off stump and again Kandamby is late in getting the bat in line. Hmm
in the corridor of uncertainty and Kandamby has a lame poke at it. Almost fatal.
in the channel outside off, left alone
around the off stump, stabbed of the inner edge to the pad
around the off stump line, defended on the front foot
Fab delivery.It landed on a length just outside off and shaped in! Kapu had shouldered arms and almost lost his off stump there!
And takes this one out. Kapu falls for the trap and is beaten, pushing inside the line. Nehra smiles
around the off stump line, pushed out to covers
straightening around the middle stump line, tucked to square-leg
on the pads, tucked to short fine-leg region
flighted around off, defended to the off side
drifts in from round the stumps, stabbed to the on side
leans forward to defend to the off
spins away sharply and the batsman pushes inside the line. Sharp turn there!
works this one to backward square-leg
full and well outside off stump and superbly square driven and PK does equally well near the boundary to stop it
leans forward to defend to the off side
around the off stump, tapped back down the pitch
gets forward to defend to the off side
fullish on the legs, whipped through midwicket
pushes this down the leg side
short in length outside off, pushed down to PK at third man
flighted full outside off, flicked from there, across the line, against the turn for a single to backward square-leg
flighted across, pushed away
leans forward to defend the flighted off break
tossed up outside off stump, pushed to covers
flighted on the middle stump line, nudged to short fine-leg
around the off stump, slow through the air, tapped to midwicket
from wide of the crease, fullish delivery on the legs, tickled behind square-leg
outside off stump and Dhoni gathers
leans across to drive to covers
short in length and well outside the off stump line, the batsman goes for the slog and top edges it to midwicket
stays back to clip it past square-leg
swerves in, fullish, pushed out to covers
in the corridor outside off, good delivery almost stopping a touch on the batsman who is beaten, pushing inside the line
flighted outside off, driven to covers
worked away behind square-leg
leans forward to tap it to backward square-leg
full and outside off, chopped away to slip
flighted delivery outside off, lots of over spin on that, driven to sweeper cover
on the middle and leg, rolls away to the on side
on the middle and leg, tapped to midwicket
banged in shorter, mistimes the pull to midwicket
low full toss, eased down to deep mid-on
drops it shorter, pulled to deep midwicket
walks down the track and guides the full delivery to third man
around off stump line, pushed to cover point
leans well forward to defend to off side
just outside off, steered to point for a single
gets forward to off drive
on the legs, turned to square-leg for a single
full and outside off stump, driven to the left of short extra cover
works this to third man for yet another single
punches this wide of sweeper cover
full in length on the middle, defended back down the track
outside off stump, tapped to backward point
moves down the track to turn it to midwicket
leans forward to defend
around the off stump line, dabbed to midwicket

on the off and middle line, steered to point for a quick single .. Kohli with the throw, Dhoni collects it on the bounce but fails to break the stumps as he gropes out in front of him, Kandamby had dived back inside the crease
in the zone outside off and Dhoni gathers
gets forward to on drive to right of long-on
leans forward to push it through the off
slightly shorter and cut down to deep backward point
full outside off, square driven through backward point
leans forward to push it to the off side
goes back to punch it to mid-on
gets back to clip it past square-leg
on driven wide of long-on for couple of runs
well outside off, cut to right of covers where Raina makes  diving stop
leans forward to defend to the on side
gets forward to squeeze it to square-leg
moves down the track and drives to long-off
leans forward to push it to point
gets forward to work it to the on side
on the middle and off, edges the defensive poke

Kandamby is run out of the no ball It was pushed towards cover point and the non striker rushed out. No response from the striker. Gone! Kapu had taken couple of steps after he played that shot and Kandamby responded by rushing down the track but by then Kapu had changed his mind
very quick, full and outside leg stump, the batsman for a big swing across the line and missed. The ball went between the leg stump and DHoni.
leans forward to drive to covers
around off stump, pushed out to covers
leans forward to push to covers
turns in from outside off, defended on the front foot
gets forward to tickle it around the corner
around the leg and middle, worked to short fine-leg
gets on the front foot to drive to off
full and outside off , squeezed of the outer edge to third man
stretches forward to stab it to backward point
around off, swatted to midwicket
on the middle, eased back to the bowler
around the leg stump line and spins down leg past Dhoni
on the off stump line, defended back down the pitch
moves down the track and turns it to midwicket
around the off stump line, jabbed to square-leg
goes right back to clip it wide of short fine-leg
flighted outside off, driven to short cover where Rohit makes a half stop
goes back to defend the off break
around the off stump line, defended on the front foot
gets forward to on drive to long-on
moves down the track and drives through cover point
Edged between keeper and DK standing at very wide slip. Well at gully almost. Maharoof was just looking to defend but was beaten by the sharp turn
turns away sharply again and Dhoni collects
gets forward to wrist it past square-leg
gets forward to ping long-on
goes back to guide it to point
flighted full outside off, on driven to long-on
leans forward to drive it superbly inside-out to cover boundary
on the middle, worked to midwicket
skips down the track to defnd
in the zone outside off, left alone
around the off stump, holds its line and Maharoof pushes outside the line. Dhoni collects.
Maharoof's poor day continues. He pokes at a short-of-length delivery leaving him and edges it through to Dhoni
sharp lifter on the middle, jabbed out to the off side ..
gets forward to drive
leans forward to defend
jumps down the track and misses the slog
on the pads, tucked down to fine-leg
fullish and outside off stump, slices it of the outer edge over backward point
short in length and just down the leg side and it goes past the attempted pull
shortish outside off, cut to backward point
full and just down the leg side and it rolls of the pad to left of Dhoni
Short delivery and it has been pulled away ... Habrhajan makes a valiant effort near the ropes but ...
pushes this to cover point for a single
banged in short, upper cut to third man boundary. Slashed away!

Raina misses the run out of Kulasekara It was tapped to short midoff region and confusion between the two. Kula had responded to Kapu's call and had rushed across. Raina charged out from covers, picked the ball and underarmed the throw at the non-striker's end but missed
short in length outside off, has a flash at it but misses
full in length around middle and leg, turned to mdiwicket
Smashed! He got forward and smoked it on the up over mid-on
kicks up from short of length, stabbed in the air but to right of point where Jadeja picks up the ball and fires a throw at the non-striker's end but misses
gets forward to defend to the off
big swing and a miss! he had charged down the track for the big hit
Whack! This time he connects. Another charge down the track and he lifts it over extra cover
outside off stump, guided to backward point
Tonked! He cleared the front foot and slapped the short delivery over wide mid-on
dabs this down to third man
Smashed! It was the full delivery on leg and middle, Kapu got outside the line and lifted it inside out over wide mid-off
full delivery on the middle, pushed back to Zak
fullish, dug out towards backward point
moves down the track to work this to deep midwicket
gets forward to work it to midwikcet
Stumped! Kula rushed down the track, couldn't reach the pitch of the ball, tried to dab it to the on side but was beaten by the turn
around the off stump, defended to the off side
on the middle and off, defended on the front foot
around off, pushed to cover point for a single
full and outside off, Malinga has a swing and a miss
bouncer around off stump, Malinga has a waft at it but can't connect
full in length around off, pushed to mid-off for a risky single but Dinda, the sub, fails to collect cleanly ..
leans forward to dead-bat the length delivery
around off stump, punched to short cover
on the leg stump line, dabbed to midwicket
on the middle, driven to right of mid-on
gets forward to defend
leans forward to defend and the ball rolls of the pad to the on side
flighted full around off, thrashed down the ground by Malinga!
on the middle and off, defended back down the pitch
around the off stump, tapped to the on side
fullish on the off, driven to long-off
No 4 for Nehra. Malinga cleared the front foot and went for the slog. He ended up slicing it just over covers and Jadeja jogged back to collect it. India just a wicket away from lifting the cup
Clubbed! He leaned forward to smash the full toss over wide long-on boundary. 50 up for Kapu
goes fora big slog but mistimes it down to long-on
around off stump, pushed to point
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
leans forward to on drive to long-on
backs away outside leg and cuts it past the slip fielder down to third man.
floated outside off, Murali pushes inside the line
India win the Asia Cup. Jadeja struck the final blow - it spun away from Murali got a thin nick through to Dhoni. Jadeja uproots the stumps, Dhoni pumps his fist and Murali turns and walks.
